c6e21e6d-5754-4ef5-9ba7-95b142f19e25.description: Holders of the Real World Leader badge are experienced Organisation Development, HR, Workforce, Recruitment, People and Leadership Practitioners or Consultants, who competently work at a strategic level with or within organisations.
c6e21e6d-5754-4ef5-9ba7-95b142f19e25.name: Real World Leader

badge_template_activities.title: This course will teach you all about the Real World Leader, including how to apply it successfully in senior leader selection or development. You will be presented with 5 videos and multiple choice assessments through which you will learn the key benefits of applying the tool in selection or development, how it was developed and how to successfully use it. Applying the Real World Leader will help organisations you work with benefit from leaders who maximise performance in a sustainable way.

skills.name: Learn about selection beyond strengths & preferences
Modern approach to leadership selection & development

6e66ddde-9f28-4603-bb20-fe6b21b7b3ed.description: Holders of the TLQ 360 Accreditation badge are experienced Organisational Development, HR, Workforce, People and Leadership Practitioners or Consultants who are competent to apply Real World Group’s Engaging Transformational Leadership Questionnaire (TLQ360). TLQ360 is designed to assess the Engaging Leadership strengths and development needs of individual leaders from junior to Executive level in any sector.
6e66ddde-9f28-4603-bb20-fe6b21b7b3ed.name: Real World Group TLQ 360 Accreditation

badge_template_activities.title: This course will teach you what you need to know about developing Engaging Leadership through the use of 360 feedback. Being an Engaging leader is particularly critical today where demands are increasing, resources are decreasing and change is constant. Coaching leaders with the TLQ360 as a foundation increases both their self-awareness and potential. It also increases their ability to enhance the potential of people they lead through expanding their capability, confidence and wellbeing.

skills.name: Active listening and empowering coachees to find their own solutions
Appreciate what makes a successful leader today
